Description.Details: Armour Piercing LMG Ammo contains APFSDS, Armor-Piercing Fin-Stabilized discarding Sabot, shell's that can 'Punch through' the toughest hide and hit vital components. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: LMG Ammo [AP]
